website_summaries.verdict: New shoe in the Vapor range, endorsed by, and created with, Roger Federer.
pros: Updated Dynamic Fit system provides speed and agility
Lightweight mesh and a full-length foot frame
cons: Narrower and stiffer than the previous Vapor models, with a definite break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Take care of your feet!
customer_reviews.text: I found these shoes a reasonable but not ideal fit. A bit narrow but after (a lot!!) of break-in it is slowly better but to ideal. They are light and the soles seem quite resistant to wear. My main criticism is they are far short of comfortable padding. An insole is a must. I infer this was scarified for lightness but they do not absorb impact well at all. I would term them reasonable and would still buy them again. Cactus
customer_reviews.author: Cactus Ken

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits slightly narrower than usual considering it is a Nike! However, this is probably one of the best shoes out there for comfort and feel. Mesh is what makes the comfort and the feel is nice due to its ability to hold up with the lateral movement involved with tennis. Three stars because the box came heavily damaged; the 3rd party I got this through on Amazon only covered it with a plastic bag with no padding. Surprised it the shoes made it cross country.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for indoor or outdoor tennis
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these tennis shoes! Super comfortable, sturdy, and they wear well. These were comfortable from the first day he wore them... no break in period needed. If you're on the tennis court frequently, these comfortable, supportive shoes are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: doodlemom

customer_reviews.title: Appears a good show, but width is small for me
customer_reviews.text: I use 11.5 , some shoes definitely no go due to width, this shoe was marginally tight to debate whether to live with it or not... But found another wide one so returned it Probably if I buy again will go half size bigger at 12
customer_reviews.author: TechUser

customer_reviews.title: A nice tennis shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Nike shoes for years and I've found the sizes to be very consistent model to model. This shoe feels a little bit tight though even after breaking the shoe in. It is not too tight though to warrant a larger size. Good shoe and pretty comfortable when on the hard court.
customer_reviews.author: ApexR1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my grandson. One happy tennis and ping pong player. If he makes Olympics some day he will thank me again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tennis shoe for serious players
customer_reviews.text: Great support and traction. Also breathes well. Fit a bit snug at first but loosened up after a few matches and is now quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: virtual traveler

customer_reviews.title: Bad/Fake item
customer_reviews.text: This did not arrive in the original packaging I would expect for a new product. It has no indication to make me believe that its made by Nike. Feels heavy and poorly made. I probably received a fake. Money lost.
customer_reviews.author: SNair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoes! It gives a good support to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan Yaoshen

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and narrower sole. Painful on legs.
customer_reviews.text: Bit stiff near toes due to upward extended sole.. narrower at front. Leg starts paining after 15 minites..
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Apine

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Seller - RPA Sales Group replaced defective laces.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe laces were too short and partially frayed; RPA Sales Group replaced the defective shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Why haven’t I received my refund yet?
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the delayed refund process. I promptly returned this shoes after receiving them and being unsatisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come on a authentic nike box but very good quality shoes
customer_reviews.author: Andre Joseph Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Laces are too short
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, only complaints are that it’s just a bit narrow and the laces are too short.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and everything was truly fine. This is my third Vapor X pair (first from CA) and finally I got the color combination that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Ontiveros

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. I had bought the Vapor 9 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I had bought the Vapor 9 and it lasted me a little over 2 years. So I bought the Vapor again and let me say that it may be the best tennis shoe I have ever worn. Kudos.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: and I just don’t like the shape of the things on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheap, colors that should be the same are different shades, and I just don’t like the shape of the things on my feet... I mean really, who has feet shaped with a big buldge on the outside of their feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent traction on court!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays high school tennis, so she is on the court five days a week. She said the the grip of the sole is excellent on the court. She never feels like her foot is slipping. My daughter also has a narrow foot and often has a difficult time finding a good fit. This shoe fits perfectly. We will definitely purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted me to order these for him. I looked at other websites and Amazon had the best price and the only one that had this color combo. Glad I bought!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Good for tennis, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same exact shoe from Nike online a couple months back and wanted the same shoe because mine had worn out. I ordered the product and it fit just as I expected as I have had the same shoe just in a different color before. The only thing with this shoe is that it appeared to have some kind of defect to it, nothing too noticeable just like the shoes weren't identical. They are good quality. I do recommend ordering a half size up. Also these shoes are meant for people with relatively narrow feet so maybe consider ordering the wide foot. Don't see why these are $140 though.
customer_reviews.author: gary

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Tennis Zoom Vapor X Knit
product_meta.description: ULTRALIGHT SPEED. With Nike Zoom Air and a Dynamic Fit system, the NikeCourt Air Zoom Vapor X provides ultimate control on hard courts. Secure Fit The Dynamic Fit system wraps your foot from the bottom of the arch up to the laces for a glove-like fit. Responsive Cushioning A Zoom Air unit in the heel offers low-profile, resilient cushioning from swing to swing. Quick Stability The full-length TPU foot frame wraps up the outside of your foot for added stability on every turn and swing. More Benefits Padded collar provides additional comfort. Built up rubber on the toe increases durability and protection from drag. Non-marking rubber outsole for durable traction on hard courts. Color: Multi-Colour/Black/Black Style: AA8030-900
feature_bullets: Upper: Nike Dynamic Fit technology combines with lightweight textiles to create a zero distraction upper. Padded collar provides added comfort.
Midsole: Nike Zoom unit in the heel with a Phylon midsole for lightweight, responsive cushioning. TPU midfoot shank for lateral support and stability.

Outsole: Nike XDR rubber in a herringbone pattern for excellent hard court traction. Generative design places added traction on the perimeter of the outsole to support explosive directional changes on the court.
